sections.title: Support and Maintenance
sections.content: If the chatbot disappears from the website, or for some reason the system needs maintenance, let us know via email support@adaptenterprise.tech and we’ll get back to you between 7am and 10pm and get it back online within the same day or the next day for you. If you go through with the systems and you ever need answers to questions or need a training session to gain confidence, contact us for that as well and we’ll set it up for free anytime. If the customer can’t get the answer they are looking for, obviously in some cases they will reach out for a human to support them. These systems are still extremely advanced but for maybe 5-10% of inquiries they will need a real person.
